mapper.select: select tg.time, t1.deptName as sheName, t2.deptName as shiName, t3.deptName as quName from t_gyxx tg left join t_dept t1 on tg.sheId = t1.id left join t_dept t2 on tg.shiId = t2.id left join t_dept t3 on tg.quId = t3.id
select t.id,t.name,t.quyu,t.shenc,t.guage,t.time from t_zs t limit #{start},#{rows}
select tg.id,tg.name,tg.lxdh,tg.lxr,tg.shul,tg.time,t.guge, tf.name as typeName from t_gyxx tg left join t_fltype_copy1 tf on tg.typeId = tf.id limit #{start},#{rows}
